name: Pixel Adventure (itch) (PAURO)
description:
Welcome to Pixel Adventure!

Pixel Adventure is a 2D pixel art game by PAURO.

Here is a short description:
  • use WASD or arrow keys to move
  • use the mouse buttons to attack
  • kill enemies to get points
  • find keys to unlock next levels
  • find your spaceship to win the game

(this is one of my first games)

(there are a few bugs)

Have fun with the game!
